Package net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.desc.condition

Conditions encode a true or false evaluation of a piece of game state.
See Also:
for more about conditions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdjacentToPermanentCondition
    Evaluates to true if the source (or the enchantment host) is adjacent to a Attribute.PERMANENT, which is ordinarily untargetable.
    AllMatchFilterCondition
    Evalutes to true if all the ConditionArg.TARGET entities pass the ConditionArg.FILTER.
    AllModuloValueEqualsZeroCondition
    A condition that is fulfilled if all the entities in ConditionArg.TARGET, when evaluated as the target to ConditionArg.VALUE1 modulo ConditionArg.VALUE2 equals zero.
    AmalgamRaceCondition
    Evaluates to true if the target is specifically the Race.ALL.
    AndCondition  
    AnyMatchFilterCondition
    Passes if any of the entities returned by resolving ConditionArg.TARGET is passed by the filter supplied in ConditionArg.FILTER.
    AttributeCondition  
    AttributeExistsCondition  
    CanPlayPactCondition
    Returns true if the source card's pact, based on card ID, can be played.
    CanSummonCondition
    Evaluates to true if the player can summon more minions.
    CardCountCondition  
    CardPropertyCondition
    Returns true if the ConditionArg.TARGET or target is not null and meets the requirements specified by ConditionArg.CARD_TYPE, ConditionArg.HERO_CLASS, ConditionArg.RACE and the card ID in ConditionArg.CARD.
    ComboCondition
    Evaluates to true if the player has played a card prior to this one this turn (i.e.
    ComparisonCondition
    Compares the values using the expression ConditionArg.VALUE1 ConditionArg.OPERATION ConditionArg.VALUE2.
    Condition
    A condition is used for true or false comparisons in the CardDesc card JSON.
    ConditionDesc  
    ControlsSecretCondition  
    CountCondition
    Evaluates to true if the ConditionArg.TARGET_PLAYER has en entity-count [ ConditionArg.OPERATION ] ConditionArg.VALUE cards.
    DeckContainsCondition  
    EventTargetMatchesReferenceCondition  
    GraveyardContainsCondition  
    GraveyardCountCondition  
    HasAttackedCondition  
    HasEntitiesOnBoardCondition  
    HasEntityCondition Deprecated.
    HasHeroPowerCondition  
    HasTargetCondition  
    HasWeaponCondition  
    HeroClassCondition  
    HighlanderDeckCondition  
    HighlanderHandCondition  
    HoldsCardCondition  
    InvokeCondition
    Returns true if the card's Attribute.INVOKE effect's cost was met.
    IsAdjacentCondition
    Returns true if the source is adjacent to the target or, when specified, the ConditionArg.TARGET.
    IsDamagedCondition
    This condition is fulfilled if the target or the single entity resolved by ConditionArg.TARGET is damaged.
    IsDeadCondition  
    ManaCostCondition  
    ManaMaxedCondition  
    MinionCountCondition  
    MinionOnBoardCondition  
    OrCondition
    This condition passes if any of the conditions in ConditionArg.CONDITIONS also pass.
    OverloadedCondition  
    OverloadedManaCrystalsCondition  
    OwnedByPlayerCondition  
    PlayedLastTurnCondition  
    RaceCondition
    Evaluates to true if the target or single entity resolved by ConditionArg.TARGET has the specified ConditionArg.RACE.
    RandomCondition
    This condition is fulfilled if the GameLogic.randomBool() method returns true.
    ReservoirCondition
    Evaluates to true when the number of cards in the player's deck is greater or equal to the ConditionArg.VALUE.
    StorageContainsCondition  
    SurgeCondition
    Evalutes to true if the HasCard.getSourceCard() of this source was drawn the same turn it was played.
